thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Westminster - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Central
thread.title_full: Central - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: muckleTheToon
title: Central
text:
Came last minute, choose this location as central to Westminster - small rooms but very clean. Staff (especially Joanna) were helpful and friendly- would definitely stay again as location was excellent
Would have been nice to have kettle in room, but tea/coffee machine was in reception for small charge and a costa next door as well as a 24hr shop across the road
